text: (nabiye!) kavurun (saturan visin) vedana gena dimen anaturuva (tamange nivesvalin) pitamam vi yuddha kara, (vividha duk gÃ¦hÃ¦tada) vinda daragena (sthira vasayen) sitiyoda, ovun venuven (ovunta varaprasadayan) pahala kirimatama niyata vasayenma obage deviyan min pasuvada, (ovunva) ksama karanneku ha (ovun kerehi) dayabaravantayeku vasayenda sitinneya
